info.game_comments: Battle of the Decades: The 1990s game 3.

(1, 1).clue: His birthplace; it's where he lived the first 7 years of his life

(2, 1).clue: 2013 brought the very rare coincidence of Thanksgiving & this religious holiday

(3, 1).clue: Hyphenated term for any sycophant or toady

(4, 1).clue: The arrow seen here is part of the logo of this retailer

(1, 2).clue: The foreign school he attended from 1968 to 1970
